main event: On October 13, 1948, Miss [REDACTED] reported seeing an unidentified object in South Bend, Indiana, that appeared silver and moved at a high speed.
interesting points: The object was described as silvery or chrome in color., The observer reported that the object held a steady and uniform course., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 to 7 minutes., No other witnesses were confirmed to see the object., The object's behavior included sudden acceleration and disappearance from sight.
witness description: Miss [REDACTED], an Executive Engineer for Body Engineering, Studebaker Corporation.
